price: And be patient, for indeed Allah does not let the reward of those who do good to go to waste.
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
